sentences.sentence: Their release was the first reintroduction of jaguars in that part of Argentina since the species almost died out there 70 years ago.
sentences.translation: 它们的放归野外，是自70年前美洲虎几乎灭绝以来阿根廷该地区首次重新出现美洲虎的身影。

sentences.sentence: Risks of reintroduction of the disease is also assessed.
sentences.translation: 还将评估再次输入疾病的风险。

sentences.sentence: Its Numbers have doubled, also due to reintroduction efforts.
sentences.translation: 它的数量已经翻倍，这也是多亏了野外放生。
